name: Public Movie Database (PMDb)
description: A MERN stack website where users can sign up and rate & review movies. The rating of a movie shown in the website is the average of all the ratings given by various users.

name: Gourmet Food
description: A complete food ordering for our college canteen.Comprises two android apps and a web admin interface.I built the entire backend as a set of two microservices using Node.js,Express and MongoDB and deployed the backend to AWS.

name: Devriel Technologies Website
description: The official website of Devriel Technologies, a complete MERN stack app.I built the entire website from scratch in less than two days using Node.js,Express,MongoDB and React.

name: Literary Club Website
description: The official website of the Literary club of our college,a complete MERN stack app. I built the entire backend and helped in integrating the Node.js based backend with the React based frontend.

name: HIT Crunch
description: A comprehensive android application for sharing notes,question papers and announcements in our college. I built the backend using Node.js and Firebase cloud functions.

name: ORSI Website
description: The official website of Operational Research Society of India.I built the entire backend the frontend for the admin panel using Node.js,Express,MongoDB and EJS.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A simple React app that lists all the characters and their famous quotes from the show Breaking Bad.

name: Thanos Snap
description: A fun project using HTML,CSS and Javascript(jQuery) that emulates the snap of Thanos. The Avengers displayed on the screen randomly disappear and reappear after each snap.
